Value.label: Toggle the sensor binary report value when the Magnet switch is opened/closed.
Enable wake up 10 minutes when the power is switched on.
Toggle the basic set value when Magnet switch is opened/closed.
Determines which report will be sent when Magnet switch is opened/ closed.
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1. Bitsets: 0->Battery report, 4->Sensor Binary, 8->Basic Set, Default setting: 0x00000100 (Basic Set) Ideal Setting for OZW is 17 (Sensor Binary and Battery Report)

Value.label: Reset configuration settings to factory defaults
Toggle the sensor binary report value when the Magnet switch is opened/closed.

Toggle the basic set value when Magnet switch is opened/closed.
Determines which report will be sent when Magnet switch is opened/ closed.

Value.label: Reset configuration settings to factory defaults
Siren sound and Volume
Value.Help: Select the Siren Sound and Volume

Value.label: Enable/disable the action button
Value.Help: Enable/disable to turn off the alarm sound via pressing the Action Button.

Value.label: Send Notifications
Value.Help: Enable to send notifications to associated devices (Group 1) when the state of Siren changed

Item.label: Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network
